code: import{createAsyncThunk,createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export const getOffers=createAsyncThunk('offers/getOffers',async lan=>{const api=await fetch("https://api.hobitourstravel.com/offer/all/"+lan);const res=await api.json();return res.data;});export const offersSlice=createSlice({name:'offers',initialState:[],reducers:{},extraReducers:builder=>{builder.addCase(getOffers.fulfilled,(state,action)=>{state=action.payload;return state;});}});export default offersSlice.reducer;
